definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade
circle/ring/loop/classifier for loops, orbits, laps of race etc/CL:個|个[ge4]/to surround/to circle
to confine/to lock up/to pen in

sentences.english: The Okinawa Trough is a back arc basin still driven by the converging asthenosphere.
sentences.chinese: 沖繩海槽仍是一個軟流圈在匯聚的弧後盆地。

sentences.english: Below the lithosphere is the rheosphere comprising partly fused peridotite .
sentences.chinese: 岩石圈之下是由部分熔融的橄欖岩所組成的軟流圈。

sentences.english: The alkalic basaltic magma of this stage may be derived from asthenosphere.
sentences.chinese: 該階段的鹼性玄武岩漿可能來源於軟流圈。
